title: Pak-China friendship has âflourished from strength to strengthâ: FO
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):Pakistan on Sunday said itâs time-tested friendship with China had flourished with strength and remained unaffected amid regional and global environment.	 âIndeed time-tested Pakistan-China friendship has flourished from strength to strength, unaffected by vicissitudes of time and changes in regional and global environment,â the Foreign Office said in a tweet after the conclusion of the visit of Foreign Minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi to China.	 FM Qureshi returned to Islamabad early Sunday morning after his two-day official visit to China where he held meetings with Chinese State Counselor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi and reaffirmed resolve to further strengthen their ties.	 âBoth Pakistan and China remain firm in resolve to further strengthen this All-Weather Strategic Cooperative Partnership,â the foreign office said.	 The spokesperson of Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs (MFA) also tweeted regarding the meeting between the two leaders.	 âIt proved again that China and Pakistan are the most trustworthy good neighbors, good friends and good brothers to each other,â the tweet said.	 The Chinese MFA also termed the friendship between China and Pakistan as âunbreakableâ.	 âThe friendship between China and Pakistan is unbreakable,â the tweet mentioned.\9327/25/2021 1:08:44 PM
